FuncDef: The pki release-certificate peer command releases a certificate of the remote device. The pki release-certificate peer command releases a certificate of the remote device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of peer certificate to be released.
The value must be an existing peer certificate file name.

Releases all certificates of the remote device.
-

ExtraInfo:
If the specified certificate of the remote device is not required, run the pki release-certificate peer command to release the certificate of the remote device.
Before using this command, run the display pki peer-certificate (All views) command to view the certificate information of the remote device.
